title: Major countries in lithium mine production 2014 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Countrys on X-axis for 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Country Australia, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL 58800.0 among the 4 groups and in Namibia, 2014 had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
Among all the Countrys, 2014 had the highest SOME LABEL in Country Australia and lowest SOME LABEL in Country Namibia.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2014 that was found in Country Australia was 13300.0 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Country Namibia.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 8 different Countrys for 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Australia had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 4 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Country Namibia for 2014.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Countrys on X-axis for 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Country Australia, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL 58800.0 among the 4 groups and in Namibia, 2014 had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
Among all the Countrys, 2014 had the highest SOME LABEL in Country Australia and lowest SOME LABEL in Country Namibia.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Countrys on X-axis for 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Country Australia had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 4 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Country Namibia for 2014.
In Country Australia, 2014 had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Country Namibia out of all 8 Countrys.
Country Australia and Namibia had the biggest gap of 13299.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2014.
Out of all 4 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of 2018.
2018 had the maximum SOME LABEL out of all 4 groups in Country Australia followed by 2018 in Australia, and the minimum SOME LABEL is found for 2014 in Namibia.
Averaging all 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019, the Country Australia is the maximum SOME LABEL and Namibia is the minimum SOME LABEL.
